subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee while playing basketball Friday, but he will not have surgery to repair it until after this season.
snippet: Denny Hamlin tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee while playing basketball Friday, but he will not have surgery to repair it until after this season.
